title: Accountable As F*ck with Teddi Mellencamp
itunes:title: Accountable As F*ck
description:
Jackie and Real Housewife Teddi Mellencamp go in deep on Beverly Hills drama, how to drink and lose weight and what to do if you’re slapped on an airplane.

This episode is brought to you by THRIVE MARKET. I use Thrive for my online grocery delivery on a weekly basis. They provide the highest quality products and ingredients delivered straight to your door with unbeatable prices. 

Be sure to grab my deal by going to https://thrivemarket.com/bible to receive $60 of FREE organic groceries from Thrive Market + free shipping and a 30 day trial!" Keep in mind that Thrive Market's  prices are already 25- 50% below retail because they cut out the middleman. And now they are offering $60 off free organic groceries!
